mapper.select: SELECT T_SCHEDULETIME.SCHEDULETIME_IDX , T_SCHEDULETIME.CLASS_TIME , T_SCHEDULETIME.START_TIME , T_SCHEDULETIME.END_TIME , T_SCHEDULETIME.USE_YN , T_SCHEDULETIME.DELETE_YN , T_SCHEDULETIME.CREATE_USER_IDX , T_SCHEDULETIME.UPDATE_USER_IDX , T_SCHEDULETIME.DELETE_USER_IDX , T_SCHEDULETIME.UPDATE_DATETIME , T_SCHEDULETIME.CREATE_DATETIME , T_SCHEDULETIME.DELETE_DATETIME , T_USER_CREATE.USER_NAME AS CREATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_UPDATE.USER_NAME AS UPDATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_DELETE.USER_NAME AS DELETE_USER_NAME FROM TB_SCHEDULETIME AS T_SCHEDULETIME LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_CREATE ON T_USER_CREATE.USER_IDX = T_SCHEDULETIME.CREATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_UPDATE ON T_USER_UPDATE.USER_IDX = T_SCHEDULETIME.UPDATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_DELETE ON T_USER_DELETE.USER_IDX = T_SCHEDULETIME.DELETE_USER_IDX WHERE T_SCHEDULETIME.SCHEDULETIME_IDX = #{scheduletimeIdx} LIMIT 1
